name: Ordinary Idle Garden
description:
Welcome to an Ordinary Idle Garden. Here, you can plant a handful of different plants, and then watch them all grow (or you can switch to a different tab and come back in a few minutes. I won't judge.).

To start planting, press a key that corresponds with one of the empty pots. Then, all you need to do is hurry up and wait for your plants to grow. Once a plant has finished growing (you will see an exclamation mark(!) next to it), press the corresponding key again to harvest and sell it.

Once you buy the trophy for 100 G, you'll win the game.

NOTE: The game will pause if you switch away from this tab, and you will make no progress unless you switch back. If you're going to switch to a different tab, I recommend playing this in a separate window.

ADDITIONAL NOTE FOR MOBILE USERS: This game assumes that you're playing with a keyboard, but otherwise is fully playable on mobile. If you tap the screen, you'll bring up a virtual VIP 8 keypad, which is much different from a keyboard. Use this guide to translate each button:

123123456QWE789ASDA0BZXC

Created for the Nokia 3310 Jam, using Octo.
